snippet: Now that Ray Rice, a hometown football hero, has been dismissed from the Baltimore Ravens and suspended indefinitely from the National Football League, the New Rochelle High School community is struggling to determine how to react.
abstract: New Rochelle, NY, and its school community, is grappling with feelings about hometown football hero Ray Rice, as he faces uncertain future in connection with domestic violence incident; Rice has been dismissed from Baltimore Ravens and suspended indefinitely from National Football League.
lead_paragraph: Now that Ray Rice, a hometown football hero, has been dismissed from the Baltimore Ravens and suspended indefinitely from the National Football League, the New Rochelle High School community is struggling to determine how to react.

headline.main: New Rochelle Struggles Amid Rice’s Unraveling
headline.print_headline: New Rochelle Struggles Amid Rice’s Unraveling
